item.description: Are you interested in beading but overwhelmed by the colors, sizes, shapes and other terms? Introduction to Beading will get you started on a wonderfully addictive and fulfilling journey. Join us for a tour where weâ€™ll explain the different kinds of beads, sizes and tools. We will also demonstrate how to attach a clasp using crimp beads so you will be well on your way to making bracelets and necklaces. Date: Saturday, May 16 at 12:30 pm or Saturday, May 23 at 1:00 pm Duration: 20 minutes Fee: A Smile

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group
